trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around December 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details while enjoying a nice sunny day in denver, 12\2\08, and as a 76 year old photo hobbyist who for ten years was a navy photographer i photographed a pulsed contrail above south denver's washington park lake. almost always carry a camera with me for an event like this. just above, and to the right, of the pulsed contrail i saw a small object making strange, rapid, unbelievable maneuvers. it moved very fast and turned extremely fast,changing it's perspective, then it disappeared behind the clouds or i would have taken a picture of it also... not a bird, nor a plane could maneuver like it did. while i was pointing my camera at the sky none of the joggers running by me along the side of lake looked up, or asked me what i was taking a picture of...
